metadata.title: CVE-2023-1326 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A privilege escalation attack was found in apport-cli 2.26.0 and earlierwhich is similar to CVE-2023-26604. If a system is specially configured toallow unprivileged users to run sudo apport-cli, less is configured as thepager, and the terminal size can be set: a local attacker can escalateprivilege. It is extremely unlikely that a system administrator wouldconfigure sudo to allow unprivileged users to perform this class ofexploit.

criterions.comment: apport: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
